column4: hi friends. I've ran remastersys backup and remastersys dist  commands and they generate a ISO file, but it seems the behavior booting with this ISO is the same: the system runs in a live session. So, how can I "install" this iso image into a system?
Did the system you made the ISO of had Ubiquity installed? If no, you can't

That's not what I mean. Run "sudo apt-get install ubiquity" before creating the ISO

but I will check it now :)
gparted must be present for partitioning to work too
hey, ubiquity is already installed
even gparted is not present, the remastersys works fine, without errors
